entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.0.2
entry.content:
[!CAUTION]
If you have not updated to v4.0.0 you must do that before continuing. Read the v4.0.0 release notes for more information.

[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is a good time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

Features

Sprite Thumbnails

Sprite thumbnails are now generated by default after a video is archived. This is run after the video is completely archived and is only visible in the Tasks/River UI. As noted in the 4.0.0 release notes, this process is not CPU intensive so users with little available resources should not be concerned. This feature can be disabled at Admin > Settings. By default there are 2 thumbnail generation workers. This can be configured using the new MAX_VIDEO_SPRITE_THUMBNAIL_EXECUTIONS environment variable.

What's Changed

  • fix(frontend): make env vars available in browser by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/574
  • fix(frontend): axios base url by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/582
  • feat: automate generate sprite thumbnails by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/583
  • feat: better tests by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/575
  • Start writing better tests. Currently the full authentication flow and archive process is tested.
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.24.0 to 0.25.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/578
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river from 0.14.3 to 0.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/571
  • build(deps): bump github.com/coreos/go-oidc/v3 from 3.11.0 to 3.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/577
  • 4.0.2 misc fixes by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/584

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.0.1...v4.0.2

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.0.4
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

Notable Changes

  • Add a toggle in the frontend user settings to display processing videos in the "recently archived" page.
  • Overhaul the storage migration logic.
  • Changing storage templates is a lot safer now. If the move fails the changes are rolled back and an error logged in the container logs.
  • Fix postgres database health check. You will need to make the following change to the postgres service to fix the health check ```diff ganymede-db: container_name: ganymede-db image: postgres:14 volumes:
    • ./ganymede-db:/var/lib/postgresql/data environment:
    • POSTGRES_PASSWORD=PASSWORD
    • POSTGRES_USER=ganymede
    • POSTGRES_DB=ganymede-prd ports:
    • 4801:5432 restart: unless-stopped healthcheck:
  • test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready", "-d", "{{ ganymede_db_name }}"]
  • test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U $${POSTGRES_USER} -d $${POSTGRES_DB}"] interval: 30s timeout: 60s retries: 5 start_period: 60s ```

What's Changed

  • feat(frontend): add settings to display processing video in recently archived by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/617
